full_description:
\n
\n
Location
\n
enfoTech Headquarters, North Brunswick, NJ
\n
Responsibilities
\n
\n
\n
Coordinate project activities to deliver IT solutions to support environmental management.
\n
Facilitate meeting discussion (prepare agenda, host meeting, capture minutes).
\n
Track action items and complete work assignments.
\n
Perform requirements analysis and develop functional requirement documents.
\n
Provide input to the system design, database design, and develop system design documents.
\n
Develop software reports using SSRS or Crystal Reports.
\n
Develop and maintain user and system documentation.
\n
Perform system testing to ensure meeting the system design.
\n
Deliver user training and provide technical support.
\n
\n
\n
Qualifications
\n
\n
\n
BS or MS with demonstrated experiences in working with relational database (minimum qualification).
\n
Good meeting facilitation, presentation, and writing/oral communication skills (minimum qualification).
\n
Good problem-solving skills; ability to analyze problems, evaluate options, and recommend solutions (highly desirable).
\n
Experience in SQL Server and understanding of relational database (highly desirable).
\n
Self-starter and quick learner who can work with limited supervision (highly desirable)Good organizational skills and attention to details.
\n
Good interpersonal skills and a team player.
\n
Experience with Microsoft Office Professional Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Project, Visio).
\n
\n
\n
Compensation
\n
Competitive salary based on qualifications, Health/Dental/vision Insurances, 401K, Long Term Disability Insurance, Life Insurance, and others in accordance with Companyâ€™s policy.
\n
How to Apply
\n
Email your cover letter and resume to Human Resources Department or fax (732) 214-8619.
\n
Please include the following in your cover letter:
\n
\n
Availability
\n
Citizenship or visa status
\n
\n
\n
